The image shared on social media showing: Fix rate 500/ day 7 pm to 12 pm Shaheen Bagh' suggests that protesters at Shaheen Bagh are agitating against CAA and NRC for money.
BJP IT cell head Amit Malviya tweeted a: In response, Shaheen Bagh protesters filed a Rs 1 crore defamation lawsuit against Malviya.
A collage posted by a Facebook user incl: Reaching Shaheen Bagh for 500 rupees and biryani', implying that protesters were being paid to participate.
The original photograph: which was found through a reverse image search, was taken by Money Sharma/ AFP on January 7, 2020, and the banner in the image reads 'Take back CAA Take back NCR'. This suggests that the viral image with the 'Fix rate 500/ day' banner has been morphed.
